attributes.action: do whatever is possible to protect the innocent citizens of Gaza from invasion and harassment  by Israel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gaza has been subjected to various forms of harassment by Israel for over 40 years resulting in misery for many of its inhabitants.  This has reached new terrors with this invasion.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "do whatever is possible to protect the innocent citizens of Gaza from invasion and harassment by Israel."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19047


Prime Minister's Office
